data.text:
Evalina MARTIN was born in January 1888 in Texas. She died on 17 March 1951 at the age of 63 in Dallas, Dallas, Texas. [NEED TO DEFINE SENTENCE:1900 Census] Obituary: TUESDAY RITES PLANNED FOR MRS. W.A. DEFORD Funeral services for Mrs. W.A. Deford Sr., 64, Dallas resident twenty-six years, will be held at 10 a.m. Tuesday at Crane-Longley Funeral Chapel, 4709 Ross. Burial will be at Laurel Land Memorial Park. Mrs. Deford died Saturday at her home, 826 Willomet, after a 3-month illness. She is survived by 5 sons, Boyce Deford, Freddie Deford, Rex Deford, W.A. Deford, Jr. and Billy Joe Deford, all of Dallas; a daughter, Miss Nada Marie Deford, Dallas; three brothers, Joe F. Martin, Austin; E.L. Martin, Claude, Armstrong County, and J.R. Martin, San Antonio, and three grandchildren. [Dallas paper, probably Dallas Morning News]. Parents: Abner Harvey MARTIN and Mary E. "Mollie" THOMAS.

Spouse: W.A. DEFORD , Sr.. Evalina MARTIN and W.A. DEFORD , Sr. were married after 1909. Children were: Boyce Lindon DEFORD, Freddie DEFORD, Rex DEFORD, W.A. DEFORD , Jr., Billy Joe DEFORD , Sr., Nada Marie DEFORD.

Spouse: Fred BROWN. Evalina MARTIN and Fred BROWN were married on 13 September 1909 in Hill Co., Texas.

Evelyn MARTIN was born on 6 December 1886. She died 14 hul 1909.

Spouse: John Clarence LOCKRIDGE. Evelyn MARTIN and John Clarence LOCKRIDGE were married.

Everett Ernest "Dick" MARTIN was born on 13 July 1884 in Carroll Co., Missouri. He died on 4 October 1945 at the age of 61 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri.

Spouse: Bessie Ellen BOUDE. Bessie Ellen BOUDE and Everett Ernest "Dick" MARTIN were married. This family lived in Chillicothe in 1935. Children were: Ernest Henry "Peck" MARTIN, Gladys MARTIN, Helen Lois MARTIN, Willard E. "Poach" MARTIN, Henrietta Pearl MARTIN, Gilbert L. MARTIN, Willett F. MARTIN.

Finis Anson MARTIN was born on 20 October 1860 in Iowa. He died on 2 July 1924 at the age of 63 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. He was buried on 6 July 1924 in Highland Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. He was an employee in a Hamilton hardware store in 1910. Parents: Samuel MARTIN and Frances LATIMER.

Spouse: Mary D. "Minnie" TAIT. Mary D. "Minnie" TAIT and Finis Anson MARTIN were married on 11 March 1884 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. Bride and groom were of Hamilton. Children were: Lois F. MARTIN, Donald F. MARTIN.

Flora MARTIN was born about 1873 in Missouri. Parents: Samuel MARTIN and Emily Jane HOYT.Florence MARTIN was born on 28 November 1919 in Monroe Twp., Livingston, Missouri. She died on 13 December 2008 at the age of 89 in Burley, Cassia, Idaho. Parents: Ira Rea MARTIN and Mary Elizabeth MEALON.

Spouse: Merle E. MCCLAIN. Florence MARTIN and Merle E. MCCLAIN were married on 29 June 1950 in Wiesbaden, Germany.

Spouse: Willard WARREN. Florence MARTIN and Willard WARREN were married in 1972.

Florence E. MARTIN was born on 12 June 1850 in Indiana. She died on 2 May 1925 at the age of 74 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried in Plymouth Cemetery, Carroll, Missouri.

Spouse: Tilly JENKS. Florence E. MARTIN and Tilly JENKS were married. Children were: Mary Rebecca JENKS, Charles Tilly JENKS, Henry Allison JENKS.

Frank MARTIN was born on 15 March 1846 in Bedford, Trimble, Kentucky. He died on 7 November 1926 at the age of 80 in Wheeling, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 9 November 1926 in Plattsburg, Clinton, Missouri. His mother was born in Germany.

Spouse: Mary R. LANE. Mary R. LANE and Frank MARTIN were married. Children were: Sally Augusta MARTIN.

Frank MARTIN was born in May 1880 in Blue Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He is identified as Fred in the 1900 Federal census. Parents: Samuel MARTIN and Emily Jane HOYT.Freddy Lester MARTIN was born on 27 September 1934 in Jamesport, Daviess, Missouri. He died on 26 August 2019 at the age of 84 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 30 August 2019 in Pilot Grove Cemetery #2 Daviess, Missouri. Parents: Paul Cruse MARTIN and Gladys E. SLOAN.

Spouse: Shirley Ann BAXTER. Shirley Ann BAXTER and Freddy Lester MARTIN were married on 27 March 1955 in Jamesport, Daviess, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Jamesport. Mr. Paul C. Martin, father of Freddie, consents to this marriage. Children were: Jerry MARTIN, Jon MARTIN, Susan MARTIN, Stephen MARTIN.

Gene R. MARTIN was born on 18 July 1926.

Spouse: Wilma June WELLS. Wilma June WELLS and Gene R. MARTIN were married on 4 June 1950 in Carrollton, Carroll, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Jackson Co., Missouri.

Geneva MARTIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Joe Young MARTIN , Sr. and Jewel FENEL.George MARTIN was born in Germany.

Spouse: Susan FISHER. Susan FISHER and George MARTIN were married. Children were: Samuel MARTIN.

George MARTIN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Maud E. MANSFIELD. Maud E. MANSFIELD and George MARTIN were married.

George MARTIN was born in 1770 in Ireland. He died in 1827 at the age of 57 in Rimersville, Clarion, Pennsylvania. He was buried in Mechanicsville, Clarion, Pennsylvania.

Spouse: Sarah SUMMERVILLE. Children were: David MARTIN.

George F. MARTIN was born about 1857 in Missouri. Parents: Alphonso Levi MARTIN and Rachel Agnes MCCUE.George Luther MARTIN was born on 29 October 1864 in Illinois. He died on 11 June 1951 at the age of 86 in Bethany, Harrison, Missouri. He died in a Bethany retirement home; his residence was in Chillicothe. He was buried in Livingston Co., Missouri. Parents: Samuel MARTIN and Emily Jane HOYT.George Washington MARTIN was born about 1810 in Tennessee.

Spouse: Nancy Jane LIGGETT. Nancy Jane LIGGETT and George Washington MARTIN were married on 19 November 1835 in Carroll Co., Missouri. Bride and groom were of Carroll Co. Children were: William MARTIN, Ann Eliza MARTIN, Elizabeth MARTIN, Ellen E. MARTIN, Narcissa MARTIN, Sarah C. MARTIN, Sophrinia MARTIN, Susan MARTIN.

Gertrude Ruth MARTIN was born on 5 February 1907 in Sturgeon, Boone, Missouri. She died on 24 November 1968 at the age of 61 in Seal Beach, Orange, California. She was buried in Evergreen Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri.

Spouse: Ralph Judson HUGHES. Gertrude Ruth MARTIN and Ralph Judson HUGHES were married.

Gilbert L. MARTIN was born about 1930 in Colorado. Parents: Everett Ernest "Dick" MARTIN and Bessie Ellen BOUDE.Gladys MARTIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Everett Ernest "Dick" MARTIN and Bessie Ellen BOUDE.

Spouse: GORTZEN. Gladys MARTIN and GORTZEN were married.

Gladys MARTIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert MARTIN and Martha HARGROVE.Gladys MARTIN was born about 1887 in Missouri. Her father was born in France.

Spouse: Charles H. HARLOW. Gladys MARTIN and Charles H. HARLOW were married on 12 February 1908 in Jackson Co., Missouri. Bride and groom were of Jackson Co., Missouri.

Gladys MARTIN was born about 1902 in Missouri. Parents: Acquilla T. MARTIN and Rebecca E. HART.Goldie Irene MARTIN was born on 31 January 1912 in Braymer, Caldwell, Missouri. She died on 26 April 1992 at the age of 80. She was buried on 29 April 1992 in Kidder Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Charles Caleb "Cale" MARTIN and Ora Bell O'DELL.

Spouse: Ira Leslie PEMBERTON. Goldie Irene MARTIN and Ira Leslie PEMBERTON were married on 30 June 1928 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. The bride was of Braymer, the groom of Breckenridge. Cale Martin, father of Goldie, gives consent. Children were: Ira Lee PEMBERTON, Jack Ray PEMBERTON.

Spouse: Dean FRANKLIN. Goldie Irene MARTIN and Dean FRANKLIN were married.

Gordon R. MARTIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Leland Ray MARTIN and Carmen MOKRY.Helen Lois MARTIN was born on 17 December 1915 in Chariton Co., Missouri. She died on 22 October 1987 at the age of 71 in Twin Falls, Twin Falls, Idaho. She was buried in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Everett Ernest "Dick" MARTIN and Bessie Ellen BOUDE.

Spouse: Ira Raynmond BAKER. Helen Lois MARTIN and Ira Raynmond BAKER were married on 17 July 1937 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Livingston Co.

Henrietta Pearl MARTIN was born about 1925 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Parents: Everett Ernest "Dick" MARTIN and Bessie Ellen BOUDE.

Spouse: Jesse James MCNALLY. Henrietta Pearl MARTIN and Jesse James MCNALLY were married on 2 July 1942 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe. George Dewey McNally, father of Jesse, gives consent. Besse Martin, mother of Henrietta, gives consent.

Spouse: CREE. Henrietta Pearl MARTIN and CREE were married.

Ida MARTIN was born about 1854 in Missouri. Parents: MARTIN and Emily Frances MARTIN.Ida MARTIN was born in April 1879 in Missouri. Parents: Edward MARTIN and Rosanna "Rose" FEENEY.Ira Rea MARTIN was born on 15 November 1881 in Carroll Co., Missouri. He died on 27 October 1965 at the age of 83 in Burley, Cassia, Idaho. He was buried on 31 October 1965 in Enon Cemetery, Carroll, Missouri. He was a farm laborer in Mooresville Township in 1900. He farmed near Braymer, Missouri in 1918. Parents: James Wesley MARTIN and Clara Priscilla REA.

Spouse: Mary Elizabeth MEALON. Mary Elizabeth MEALON and Ira Rea MARTIN were married on 26 December 1906 in Missouri. Children were: Clara J. MARTIN, Daniel J. MARTIN, Lawrence Larue MARTIN, Florence MARTIN, Wilbur E. MARTIN, Mary Lucille MARTIN, Benjamin Malone MARTIN.

Iva MARTIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert MARTIN and Martha HARGROVE.J. B. MARTIN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Maude M. OXFORD. Maude M. OXFORD and J. B. MARTIN were married on 12 June 1909 in Gallatin, Daviess, Missouri. The groom was of Pattonsburg, the bride of Jackson Twp.

J. M. MARTIN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Rosanna JOHNSON. Rosanna JOHNSON and J. M. MARTIN were married. Children were: Elizabeth Frances Maria MARTIN.

Dr. Jackson L. MARTIN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Elizabeth S. "Lizzie" KIRK. Elizabeth S. "Lizzie" KIRK and Dr. Jackson L. MARTIN were married.

James MARTIN was born in 1830 in Ohio.

Spouse: Elizabeth Jane STAPLETON. Elizabeth Jane STAPLETON and James MARTIN were married on 29 October 1857 in Daviess Co., Missouri.

James MARTIN was born about 1841 in Pennsylvania. He died before 1880 at the age of 39.

Spouse: Emma Elizabeth LOUDERBACK. Emma Elizabeth LOUDERBACK and James MARTIN were married about 1867. Children were: Laurina E. MARTIN, Peter MARTIN.

James Alfred MARTIN was born about 1938 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. Parents: Paul Pershing MARTIN and Ruth L. PHIPPS.James Clifford MARTIN was born in 1910 in Missouri. Parents: Charles Caleb "Cale" MARTIN and Ora Bell O'DELL.

Spouse: Eula TUTTLE. Eula TUTTLE and James Clifford MARTIN were married on 17 January 1931 in Breckenridge, Caldwell, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Braymer. Children were: Joan MARTIN, Roger MARTIN, Mona MARTIN.

James Dale MARTIN was born in 1945 in Kansas City, Jackson, Missouri. Parents: Lawrence Larue MARTIN and Grace Marie SMITH.

Spouse: Mary Gail MCPEAK. Mary Gail MCPEAK and James Dale MARTIN were married in August 1970 in Lamesa, Dawson, Texas. Children were: Amy Nicole MARTIN, Shana Leah MARTIN, Jamie Lynn MARTIN.

James Decatur MARTIN was born on 8 February 1841 in Missouri. He died in Corpus Christi, Nueces, Texas. Parents: David MARTIN and Hannah FROST.

Spouse: Nancy CASTEPHONE. Nancy CASTEPHONE and James Decatur MARTIN were married in 1868.

Spouse: Prudence Ella SEE. Prudence Ella SEE and James Decatur MARTIN were married in 1886.

James Frank Lytle MARTIN was born on 25 April 1910 in Chatt, Hill, TX. He died on 12 April 1972 at the age of 61 in Temple, Bell, Texas. Parents: Joe Frank MARTIN and Myrtle Hulda YOUNG.

Spouse: Ruth Estelle LEWIS. Ruth Estelle LEWIS and James Frank Lytle MARTIN were married on 25 August 1932 in Hillsboro, Hill, TX. Children were: James Lewis MARTIN, Nancy Jane MARTIN.

James Joseph MARTIN was born on 10 March 1871 in Rich Hill Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 13 February 1946 at the age of 74 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 15 February 1946 in St. Columban Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Joseph MARTIN and Ellen PENDERGAST.

Spouse: Agnes Cecilia MURPHY. Agnes Cecilia MURPHY and James Joseph MARTIN were married on 3 July 1901 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Emily MARTIN, Mary MARTIN, Dorothy MARTIN, Patricia MARTIN, Rita Jane MARTIN.

James L. MARTIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Willard E. "Poach" MARTIN and Marjorie Ellen NIBARGER.James Lewis MARTIN was born on 28 July 1935 in Hillsboro, Hill, TX. He died in 1997 at the age of 62 in Lumberton, Hardin, Texas. Parents: James Frank Lytle MARTIN and Ruth Estelle LEWIS.

Spouse: Fran COLLINS.

James Paul MARTIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Thomas Harvey MARTIN and Thelma ADAMS.James R. MARTIN was born about 1898 in Missouri. Parents: James Wesley MARTIN and Mary Ann SHOUSE.James Robie MARTIN was born on 1 August 1895 in Hill Co., Texas. He died in 1943 at the age of 48. [NEED TO DEFINE SENTENCE:1900 Census] Parents: Abner Harvey MARTIN and Mary E. "Mollie" THOMAS.James W. "Jim" MARTIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Benjamin Malone MARTIN and Ruth .James Wesley MARTIN was born on 23 August 1859 in DeGraff, Logan, Ohio. He died on 14 August 1942 at the age of 82 in Braymer, Caldwell, Missouri. James was the oldest of eight surviving children of Daniel and Mary. Parents: Daniel Harrison MARTIN and Mary Magdelene GOODHART.

Spouse: Clara Priscilla REA. Clara Priscilla REA and James Wesley MARTIN were married on 26 August 1879. Children were: Ira Rea MARTIN.

Spouse: Mary Ann SHOUSE. Mary Ann SHOUSE and James Wesley MARTIN were married. Children were: James R. MARTIN.
